title: LoL Store Purchase Error?
body:
Hey, is anyone else having a problem with purchasing items at the store [with RP]?
https://s31.postimg.org/bxw2rrkl7/Untitled.png
[EDIT] 
This issue has been resolved, I am able to purchase things again.

replies.body:
Any updates? having some trouble buying augmented caches, and lost a key I forged before.

Edit: An hour later I throw another $5 on my account and buy the bigger augmented cache bundle and it works.
annoying issue though.

Hey there,

Could you run through the "[ISSUES WITH THE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS STORE (PVP.NET)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-)" support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
Can you please explain this one?? https://gyazo.com/90379dfb236b89f930765f953cd1defe
Have you run through the guide I linked?
Yes. I even tried re-installing but nothing. I still cant buy my caches.

Unfortunately, I tried everything on the page suggested, but nothing works. I might try re-installing the launcher to see if that helps.
[EDIT]
Oh, well I guess it's working for me now?
Thanks for your help anyways, I appreciate it!
Glad to hear your issue has been resolved :)
